# ğŸ“š User Guide

Welcome to the NULS AI User Guide! This section provides comprehensive documentation for users who want to learn how to use the NULS AI platform effectively.

# ğŸ¯ What You'll Learn

The User Guide covers everything from basic concepts to advanced features, helping you understand and utilize the NULS AI platform to its full potential.

# ğŸš€ Quick Start

# For New Users

If you're new to NULS AI, start with these essential guides:

  1. Quick Start - Get up and running in 5 minutes
  2. Transaction Operations - Learn how to perform transactions
  3. Node Creation - Understand how to run and manage nodes

# For Advanced Users

If you're already familiar with blockchain basics:

  1. POCM Mechanism - Participate in community governance
  2. Multi-Signature Accounts - Secure account management
  3. Docker Deployment - Advanced deployment options

# ğŸ“– Documentation Categories

# ğŸš€ Getting Started

Essential guides for new users to understand the basics:

  • Quick Start - 5-minute introduction to NULS AI
  • Transaction Operations - How to perform transactions
  • Linux Tutorial - Linux environment setup

# âš™ï¸ Node Management

Comprehensive guides for node operators:

  • Node Creation - Create and run NULS nodes
  • Node Upgrade - Upgrade and maintain nodes
  • Docker Deployment - Deploy using Docker containers
  • Linux Tutorial - Linux environment setup

# ğŸ›ï¸ Governance & Consensus

Learn about community governance and consensus mechanisms:

  • POCM Mechanism - Proof of Credit Mining consensus
  • Governance Participation - How to participate in governance
  • Multi-Signature Accounts - Secure multi-signature management

# ğŸ¯ User Roles

# ğŸ‘¤ Regular Users

Focus: Basic usage and transactions

  • Start with Quick Start
  • Learn Transaction Operations
  • Understand Multi-Signature Accounts

# ğŸ”§ Node Operators

Focus: Node management and maintenance

  • Begin with Node Creation
  • Study Node Upgrade
  • Master Docker Deployment

# ğŸ›ï¸ Governance Participants

Focus: Community governance and consensus

  • Learn POCM Mechanism
  • Understand Governance Participation
  • Explore Multi-Signature Accounts

# ğŸ”§ Tools and Resources

# Essential Tools

  • NULS AI Light Wallet - Official wallet application
  • NULS AI Explorer - Blockchain explorer
  • NULS AI Node Wallet - Node management tools

# Learning Resources

  • Video Tutorials - Step-by-step video guides
  • Community Forum - Ask questions and share experiences
  • GitHub Repository - Access source code and examples

# ğŸ“š Learning Path

# Beginner Path (1-2 weeks)

  1. Week 1: Basic concepts and quick start

    • Read Quick Start
    • Practice Transaction Operations
    • Set up Multi-Signature Accounts

  2. Week 2: Node basics

    • Learn Node Creation
    • Understand Docker Deployment

# Intermediate Path (2-4 weeks)

  1. Week 3-4: Advanced features
    • Master Governance Participation
    • Study POCM Mechanism
    • Explore Node Upgrade

# Advanced Path (1-2 months)

  1. Month 1-2: Expert level
    • Deep dive into consensus mechanisms
    • Advanced node management
    • Community governance leadership

# ğŸ› ï¸ Common Tasks

# Quick Reference

  • Create Account - How to create a new account
  • Send Transaction - How to send transactions
  • Run Node - How to run a NULS node
  • Participate in Governance - How to vote and propose

# Troubleshooting

  • Node Issues - Node-specific problems
  • Transaction Issues - Transaction-related problems
  • Linux Tutorial - Linux environment setup
